statements: SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE '%Shoes%'
SELECT sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount > 1000 ORDER BY sale_date DESC
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT sale_id, product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM SalesData WHERE sale_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY sale_id ASC
SELECT * FROM SalesData WHERE product_name LIKE '%shirt%' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT product_name, AVG(sale_amount) AS avg_amount FROM SalesData GROUP BY product_name HAVING AVG(sale_amount) > 800 ORDER BY avg_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT sale_id, sale_amount, quantity_sold FROM sales_data;
SELECT product_id, product_name, unit_price FROM product_data;
SELECT sale_date, quantity_sold, sale_amount FROM sales_data ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_id, category, unit_price FROM product_data WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT * FROM sales_data WHERE sale_id = 100;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price FROM product_data WHERE unit_price > 50.00 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, product_name, quantity_sold FROM sales_data s JOIN product_data p ON s.product_id = p.product_id WHERE s.quantity_sold >= 10;
SELECT sale_id, product_name, category, unit_price FROM sales_data s JOIN product_data p ON s.product_id = p.product_id ORDER BY s.sale_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, category, unit_price, sale_amount FROM product_data p LEFT JOIN sales_data s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.sale_amount > 100.00;
SELECT product_id, product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data;
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier ORDER BY supplier_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, sale_date FROM sales_data WHERE sale_amount > 1000;
SELECT product_id, category, supplier_id FROM product WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY sale_amount DESC
SELECT * FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND supplier_id = 123
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier WHERE supplier_id = 456
SELECT product_name, sale_date, sale_amount FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 5
SELECT category, COUNT(*) as total_products FROM product GROUP BY category
SELECT * FROM sales_data;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_id DESC;
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT customer_name, city, country FROM customers WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_price, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped';
SELECT * FROM sales_data ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, unit_price, category FROM products WHERE unit_price > 50;

SELECT sales_data.order_id, products.product_name, customers.customer_name FROM sales_data JOIN products ON sales_data.product_id = products.product_id JOIN customers ON sales_data.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS num_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_orders > 3;
SELECT AVG(unit_price) AS avg_price, MAX(unit_price) AS max_price, MIN(unit_price) AS min_price FROM products;
SELECT * FROM products ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, brand, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity >= 10 AND total_amount <= 500;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_name, brand, price FROM products WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE location = 'New York' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT product_name, brand, category, price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY category, price ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, status FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
